Product Description  
Specifications
Features
Samurai Shark Sharpening Blade Sharpens Everything

Tungsten carbide blade sharpens serrated knives, scissors and blades etc. Ergonomic design for left & right-handed people
Hand-held tool with Tungsten Carbide Steel Sharpening Blades.
Unique angle that adds a razors edge and precision to the tools to be sharpened.
Leveling knob to adjust the width of the blades
Retractable blade for safe and easy storage.
Ergonomic design for left & right-handed people.
The only sharpening blade that sharpens serrated edges.
Use in kitchen, garden, garage, crafts or camping.
Sharpens kitchen knives, forks, scissors, lawn mowers, axes, saws, peelers, pruning sheers, food-processor blades, and snow-boards and skis, etc.
Convenient to use: Simply slide the dull or blunt edge against the tungsten carbide steel sharpening blade from top to bottom for a minimum of three times.
Easy to store: fits easily in a tool-box, drawer, car glove-box or pocket
Perfect gift for those who love cooking or tools.
Handy item to have in the house.
APPROXIMATE DIMENSIONS
4cm x 3cm x 16cm
Warranty
15 Days Vendor Warranty Against Any Manufacturing Defect
In the Box
1 One Tungsten Carbide Steel Sharpening Blade.
One user manual
